scenario_text.value:
You know...I kinda get where Renamon’s coming
from.
I’d do whatever it takes to protect Miu.
I’ll never forgive anyone who hurts Miu.
Even if it meant holding a grudge forever?
...If it came to that.
...I couldn’t get over it like Renamon did.
You’ll never be an adult at this rate.

Shut up. If an adult is someone who wouldn’t
get pissed that Miu got hurt...
I don’t care if I stay a kid my whole life.
But... I guess that’ll end soon.
End?

Miu’s changed since we came to this world,
y’know? Soon she’ll be fine without me.

(Hmm, Miu certainly has grown. Should he give
her some space? Or keep acting as always...?)
Kaito, Miu...
Is fine on her own.
Still needs you.
Is fine on her own.
She’s just fine on her own.

You think so, huh? I guess I’d better learn
to give her some space.

Still, don’t force yourself to do the
impossible.

I can’t imagine a Kaito that didn’t worry
about his sister.

That’s a problem in itself. Still, I can’t
help it.
...All I’ve ever thought about is her.
Still needs you.

She still needs you, Kaito. You’re family,
after all.
Family...

Yeah. That’s why I think she’ll always need
you, in some way.

You’re probably right... We’re family, after
all.

Still... The professor’s partner feels
betrayed, right?
Betrayed by his family.
If that’s the case...

It’s not a simple thing. Imagine being left
behind for decades...

You’d lose the ability to forgive anyone,
wouldn’t you?

No one could blame him for that.
...I hope nothing bad happens, though.

(I’m sure he holds a grudge. Still, I want
him and the professor to make up.)
Kaito, we should...
Trust the professor.
Save the professor.
Trust the professor.
Let’s trust him, and the bond he built.

Guess we have no choice... Let’s hope his
bond is like ours.
It should be strong...right?

I think so. If I don’t believe in it, nothing
will change.
...Yeah, you’re right. I’ll believe, too.
Save the professor.

Let’s save him. He’s saved us countless times
himself.
Now it’s our turn to pay him back.

Damn straight. I can’t just let him take care
of us all the time.
Let’s go and save him!
Still...

To be honest, I never thought you and I’d be
able to talk like this back then.
Back then... You mean when we first met?

Yeah. Compared to that time, I... We’ve all
changed, haven’t we?

No matter what we said to you back then,
you’d only say—
That you’re sticking with Miu, right?
Well I had my reasons, you know?
...Do you think Miu’s changed, too?

I don’t know what Miu was like before you
guys came here...

But the Miu who cried for everyone in the
amusement park is definitely a good kid.

Yeah. She’s changed, you know. And she’ll
keep on changing, I’m sure of it.

Still, we’re family. I want to us to be
together.

The two of you can do it. Until the day you
two naturally go your separate ways.
Yeah. Until that day... We’ll be together.

(Kaito really is a great brother. I just hope
he doesn’t piss off Miu by overdoing it.)
(What should I say to Kaito?)
You’re a good brother.
Pace yourself.
You’re a good brother.

You’re a good brother. If I had a brother
like you...
You’d be happy?

Naw, I think I’m happier to have you as my
friend.

Yeah, that beats having you as a little
brother any day.
Let’s keep the good times going!
Pace yourself.

You’d better pace yourself, man. Miu may end
up hating you, you know?

Shut up! Although, well, I’ll still be
careful anyway.

It ain’t right, y’know...for family to be at
each other’s throats.

Welp, the finale’s coming up. You sure you’re
up for this, Takuma?
Yeah, same as you.
Let’s keep pushing through to the end!
